name: Crown of Madness
description:
Quantum Team Member

In the Crown of Madness, players are transported to a faraway kingdom where an ancient ritual promises immense power to whoever wears the Crown. To claim the Crown, one must defeat its wearer in battle, but with each victory comes a new challenger seeking to take the prize for themselves.

In this fighting game, players  rival against The Crown, players must use strategy and skill to claim the Crown and rule the kingdom.

But with each victory comes a price. The power of the Crown corrupts even the purest of souls, leading to a never-ending cycle of betrayal and war. In this dark and thrilling world, players must fight for power, die, and become part of the vicious cycle of evil.

So join the fight, and embark on a journey through the kingdom of power in the Crown of Madness.

How to play?

  • Move - W, A, D or Arrow key
  • Attack- Enter, or Z

GitHub Repo:  https://github.com/PutawanDE/QuantumGGJ
Global Game Jam: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/crown-madness-0
